data.name: Running Remote Conference
data.description: 2-day conference focused on managing remote teams. Learn from experts how to start and scale an office-less business. 20-21 April, Austin, TX. Get your Pass!

relatedRecords.name: Global Azure Atlanta 2020
relatedRecords.description: The annual Global Azure (formerly Global Azure Bootcamp) event will return to the greater metro-Atlanta area for the 6th year! The Global Azure event is a free one-day mini-conference, taking place on April 23-25 2020 in venues across the world, driven by Microsoft Azure experts and community enthus…

relatedRecords.name: Engineering Leadership Summit 2020
relatedRecords.description: Code Climate provides automated code review for your apps, letting you fix quality and security issues before they hit production. We check every commit, branch and pull request for changes in quality and potential vulnerabilities. If an issue is found, you’re notified immediately - it’s that simple…

relatedRecords.name: Agile Games New England 2020 Conference
relatedRecords.description: We are excited to announce that Agile Games 2020 will be held June 1-3 at Boston University. This move allows us to continue growing in a space that allows this unique gathering to flourish.
